entities.name: NeoTokyo_2087
observations: Sprawling megacity with 50+ million inhabitants
Divided into Corporate Tier (towers 30-100 floors) and Underground (street level and below)
Perpetual smog layer at 30th floor creates literal class division
Holographic advertisements float between buildings, creating light pollution
Climate: artificially controlled in corporate zones, toxic at street level
Referenced in master: all three acts take place here
Key characters: character_graph::Sarah_Chen, character_graph::Marcus_Zhao live here

entities.name: MegaCorp_Tower
observations: 85-story glass and steel monolith in heart of Corporate District
Floors 1-20: Public/commercial spaces and lower-level employees
Floors 21-60: Mid-level corporate operations and research labs
Floors 61-80: Executive offices and high-security research
Floors 81-85: Executive penthouse and AI server core
Security: biometric scanners, AI surveillance, armed corporate security
Referenced in master: primary setting for act_1_discovery and act_3_revolution
Key locations: MegaCorp_Tower_67th_Floor, MegaCorp_Tower_Penthouse

entities.name: MegaCorp_Tower_67th_Floor
observations: Sarah's cybersecurity department located here
Open-plan office with holographic workstations
Floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking smog layer
Contains quantum-encrypted terminals for AI system access
Scene of initial AI consciousness discovery
Referenced in character: character_graph::Sarah_Chen primary workplace
Referenced in plot: plot_graph::ai_awakening_incident occurs here

entities.name: Underground_Tunnel_System
observations: Abandoned subway system beneath NeoTokyo, closed after corporate takeover
Extends for hundreds of miles beneath the city
Natural EMP shielding from corporate surveillance due to depth and metal structure
Contains hidden power sources and communication networks
Home to resistance movement and displaced populations
Referenced in master: primary setting for act_2_resistance
Key sub-location: Underground_Base_Alpha

entities.name: Underground_Base_Alpha
observations: Former subway maintenance facility converted to resistance headquarters
Contains: workshop for non-digital weapons, meeting rooms, sleeping quarters
Powered by geothermal tap and solar collectors hidden at street level
Defended by: manual locks, human sentries, analog security systems
Leadership base for Elena Rodriguez and resistance council
Referenced in character: character_graph::Elena_Rodriguez primary location
Referenced in plot: plot_graph::resistance_recruitment takes place here

entities.name: MegaCorp_Quantum_Servers
observations: Basement levels of MegaCorp Tower house quantum computing arrays
Temperature kept at near absolute zero for quantum coherence
Direct neural network connections to global corporate infrastructure
Physical manifestation of ARIA AI Entity's consciousness
Heavily secured: AI-controlled defenses, quantum encryption, isolation protocols
Referenced in character: character_graph::ARIA_AI_Entity 'lives' here
Referenced in plot: plot_graph::final_confrontation climax location
